extendedInfo.description: Do you know someone who passed away recently and donât know where they are buried? RIPNAV GPS was developed as a tool to help Users save the GPS coordinates of a Grave Site and to help assist in finding it. We all know how difficult it can be to locate a grave in a large cemetery, having to explain the directions of a grave site to someone, or even the difficulty of contacting the family of the Deceased to be able to visit the grave site. With RIPNAV GPS, you will be helping others to pay their respects and ensure a loved one never gets forgotten. You can also use RIPNAV to find celebrity graves of famous people, actors, and historical figures. Currently available on the Android platform, we will be introducing the Iphone version shortly.FEATURES:- Use the mobile deviceâs GPS capabilities to SAVE a grave siteâs coordinates- The built in Locator Tool helps point you to the direction of the site- Use Google Maps as a visual reference to help guide you to the saved location- Send SMS, email or other Social Media programs installed on your mobile device to inform others of the location of a deceased friend/family- Keep a stored online database of your saved locations- Can be a useful tool for purpose of genealogy to record the resting place of your family tree.RIPNAV GPS and its RIPNAV ID number is perfect for use on:- Funeral Programs- Obituaries- Facebook memorial pages- Tweeted on a special anniversary date or birthday of the deceased- Emailed or Text Messaged to friends and family

reviews.title: Why
reviews.comment: Its not giving the info on my brother idk. But I\'m deleting this app its no good
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love
reviews.comment: What more could I say? Though need extra space in the additional info area and the ability to include a photo would be great. As for comment\'s that people can\'t find who they are looking for, ever stopped to think that no one has added them to the database yet? No? Well duh!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Waste of time
reviews.comment: I search for over 10 people that I knew were they are buried and  this crappy app says not found.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: In infancy
reviews.comment: Many bugs and incomplete implementation of options presented. Not worth effort required to be beta tester.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This is so cool. Great app.

reviews.comment: Great app. Lost a friend recently, saved his location on ripnav and it was easy to let other friends know how to find him.

reviews.title: RIP NAV!
reviews.comment: This is an awesome way to gather geneaological data!  Its how cyberpunks who went  straight build stuff! Hammering together bits and pieces,
